name: AcerbicRingItem
description: When this ring's wearer attacks with bombs, they deal additional 1d6 damage.

name: AllRoundDefenseItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring is 10 feet from the companion who wears the same ring, they both gain the effect of Back to Back feat. If they both already have the Back to Back feat, they gain an additional +2 bonus to AC.

name: ArcaneSignet
description: This signet grants its wearer the ability to cast magic missile spell as a 3rd level wizard three times a day.

name: Artifact_RingOfSummonsItem
description: This ring grants the wearer an ability to summon either axiomites or soul eaters, randomly selected, once per day, as if they were summoned by a summon monster VIII spell (caster level 15, DC 22). All allies, including the wearer, within 30 feet gain a +2 bonus to weapon damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against attacks made or effects created by chaotic creatures.

name: Artifact_SpikedGauntletItem
description: These spiked gauntlets grant the wearer's animal companion (as well as Azata's dragon or Lich's skeletal champion) a +6 bonus to Strength ability score. At the beginning of the battle, the creature must pass a Will saving throw (DC 17) or start attacking party members. If the initial saving throw is failed, the creature can make new saving throws each round to stop the effect.

name: AvengingRingItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring becomes a target of an attack of opportunity, the attacker suffers 1d8 force damage.

name: BeastKingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer's animal companion (if they have one) a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength and Dexterity scores.

name: BlackRingWithRunesItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +1 luck bonus on all saving throws against fire based effects.

name: BlessedSignet
description: This signet grants its wearer the ability to cast bless spell as a 1st level cleric three times a day.

name: BorealMightItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: BrokenPhylacteryBodyRingItem
description: When your HP falls below 0, your HP is restored by the number of enemies that you have slain today, and the ring summons 1d4+2 undead skeletal champions around you.

name: BrokenPhylacteryRing_IntermediateItem
display_name: Ring with the Phylactery of Stevanius the Rotten
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: BrokenPhylacterySoulRingItem
description: You bound a part of your soul to the ring. You gain a +4 bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects, emotions, confusion, fear, death, and compulsion effects, but a -2 penalty to poison, elemental, paralyzing and movement impairing effects. As a free action, you can lose HP equal to half your level to grant target creature a +2 bonus to attack rolls, and transform their weapon damage type into force, for 1 round.

name: ChameleonRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +10 enhancement bonus on Stealth skill checks.

enchant.name: Stealth10
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillStealth (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: ConmansRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus on all Perception and Trickery skill checks.

enchant.name: ConmansRingEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillPerception (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Competence)

name: DarkOmenItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: EarthUnleashedItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: ElementalProtectorItem
description: This ring grants the wearer acid resistance 30, fire resistance 20, electricity resistance 10, and cold resistance 5. It also grants a +4 bonus on saving throws against cold, a +3 bonus on saving throws against electricity, a +2 bonus on saving throws against fire, and a +1 bonus on saving throws against acid.

name: EnliveningLeaderishipItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Persuasion checks and grants their companions a +1 morale bonus on all skill checks.

enchant.name: EnliveningLeaderishipEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Competence)

name: FireflyRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity and the ability to cast cleanse spell three times per day as a 9th level cleric.

enchant.name: Dexterity8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Dexterity (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: FlowOfWaterRingItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +1 bonus on saving throws against spells with cold descriptor and adds +1 to the DC for all saving throws against spells with cold descriptor the wielder casts.

name: HerbalRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against disease, nausea, and sickened effects.

name: InfernalBondRingItem
description: If the wearer of this ring is a kineticist, the bonus given to them by their gather power ability is increased by 1.

name: LinziRing
description: Linzi's ring prevents her from dying and teleports her to a safe location should she fall in battle.

name: MartyrsTestamentItem
description: The wearer of this ring becomes vulnerable to fire, but also gets a +4 bonus on Will saving throws and immunity to mind-affecting conditions.

enchant.name: MartyrsTestamentEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to SaveWill (descriptor: UntypedStackable)

name: PaladinsRingItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has smite evil class ability, this ring grants them one additional use of it per day after resting.

name: ParagonOfWinterRing
description: This ring grants both its wearer and the monsters summoned by them cold resistance 30 and vulnerability to fire.

name: PortalStonePlanarRingItem
description:
This ring improves its wearer's summoning abilities. All summon spells of 6th level and lower are maximized, as though using the Maximize Spell feat. The wearer also gains a +1 insight bonus to attack rolls against outsiders.
Maximize Spell

name: PortalStoneRing_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: PortalStoneSpiderRingItem
description: You can activate this ring to create an almost transparent silver lining that connects all party members in a 30 feet area. While in this state you share an unbreakable bond, while under this effect all members get an additional attack of opportunity per round. If an attack of opportunity was a critical hit, the enemy is staggered. If one of the party members falls unconscious, a giant spider is summoned to fight alongside you for 3 rounds.

name: PortalStoneStanceRingItem
description: While wearing this ring, whenever the wearer is in a defensive stance and lands a first attack after activating this stance, the enemy is pushed 10 feet away and is knocked prone for 1 round.

name: PrologueRing
description: This ring grants its wearer a +1 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection1
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: ProtectionOfColdItem
description: This ring grants the wearer cold resistance 10. If the wearer has the Iceplant hex, it also grants them +2 natural armor bonus.

name: RavagerOfDreadRingItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +4 morale bonus against confusion and fear effects. If the wearer fails a saving throw against such effect, after the effect ends the wearer gets a +2 bonus on saving throws and +2 bonus on damage rolls until the end of the combat.

name: RedSalamandraItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: RinfOfHintsItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge

enchant.name: RinfOfHintsEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeWorld (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Competence)

name: RingMasterpieceItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 luck bonus on attack and damage rolls, saving throws, skill checks and spell penetration checks. It also grants immunity to curses.

enchant.name: RingMasterpieceEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AdditionalAttackBonus (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillMobility (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillAthletics (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillLoreNature (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillPerception (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillStealth (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillLoreReligion (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillKnowledgeWorld (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 2 to AdditionalDamage (descriptor: Luck)

name: RingOfAcidImmunityItem
description: This ring grants its wearer immunity to acid.

name: RingOfBalanceGreaterItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +5 deflection bonus to AC, immunity to emotion effects, immunity to fear, immunity to confusion, and a continuous effect of freedom of movement spell. It can only be worn by true neutral (on both axes) characters.

enchant.name: Deflection5
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfBalanceLesserItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC, and immunity to emotion effects. It can only be worn only by neutral (on at least one axis) characters.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfBigBoom
description: This ring grants its wearer a +12 damage bonus to bomb damage and the ability to cast slow spell twice per day as a 5th level wizard.

name: RingOfBlurItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a continuous blur spell effect.

name: RingOfChaosItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC and a continuous freedom of movement spell effect. Only chaotic characters can equip it.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfChaoticTortureItem
description: This is a ring of protection +2. Additionally, it increases the DC for all saving throws against spells from the Enchantment school the wearer casts by 2. It also grants the wearer a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells of the Enchantment school.

enchant.name: Deflection2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfCircumstancesItem
description:
The wearer of this ring can, after resting while wearing it, activate up to 4 abilities from the list below. Removing the ring will immediately remove all bonuses from it.
+2 circumstance bonus to Strength
+2 circumstance bonus to Dexterity
+2 circumstance bonus to Constitution
+2 circumstance bonus to Intelligence
+2 circumstance bonus to Wisdom
+2 circumstance bonus to Charisma
+1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws
+1 circumstance bonus to weapon damage rolls
+2 circumstance bonus to all skills checks
+5 feet circumstance bonus to movement speed
+1 circumstance bonus to AC
+1 circumstance bonus to DCs of all spells and usable abilities

name: RingOfCorrosionItem
description: Whenever the wearer casts a spell with acid descriptor, that spell deals +1 point of damage per die rolled.

name: RingOfDeadlySwingItem
description: This ring grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Mobility checks and +2 competencce bonus on attack rolls with throwing axes, darts, and javelins.

enchant.name: RingOfDeadlySwingEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillMobility (descriptor: Competence)

name: RingOfDevastatingWillItem
description: This ring of protection +3 grants the wearer an ability to avoid magical and unusual attacks with great willpower. If a character makes a successful Will saving throw against an attack that normally deals half damage on a successful save, instead they take no damage. A helpless character does not gain this benefit.

enchant.name: Deflection3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfEnergySourceItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to channel energy, it allows them to do it 2 additional times per day.

name: RingOfEnhancedSummonsItem
description: This ring grants the monsters summoned by its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus for their weapons.

name: RingOfEternalSkyItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 bonus to attack rolls with melee weapons.

name: RingOfEvasionItem
description: This ring continually grants the wearer the ability to avoid damage as if the player had evasion ability. Whenever she makes a Reflex saving throw to determine whether she takes half damage, a successful save results in no damage.

name: RingOfFirmTouchItem
description: This is a ring of protection +2. It grants the wearer a +3 competence bonus on touch attack rolls.

enchant.name: Deflection2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfGuidingStarItem
description: This ring grants the wearer +4 bonus to Initiative rolls. Whenever the wearer lands a hit against an undamaged enemy, it grants all companions a +3 bonus on damage rolls for one round.

name: RingOfHonorOfDeathItem
description: This ring grants its wearer negative energy resistance 20, and the ability to cast breath of life spell once per day as a 9th level cleric.

name: RingOfHumbleMasterItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 bonus to attack rolls with melee weapons, and a +1 dodge bonus to AC.

enchant.name: EnchantDodge1
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Dodge)

name: RingOfHuntersLuckItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +1 bonus on damage rolls with bows and a +2 luck bonus on Lore (Nature) checks.

name: RingOfImminentDemiseItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring makes an attack of opportunity, the enemy must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 26) or be knocked down. The ring also grants a +2 competence bonus on attack and damage rolls with two-handed weapons.

name: RingOfImprovedProfeciencyItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 deflection bonus to AC and +1 competence bonus on attack rolls with melee weapons.

enchant.name: RingOfImprovedProfeciencyEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfLawItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC, and immunity to confusion and fear. Only lawful characters can equip it.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfLuck1
description: This ring grants its wearer a +1 luck bonus on all saving throws. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

name: RingOfPlanarProtectionItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 deflection bonus to AC and +3 bonus to saving throws against Conjuration school.

enchant.name: RingOfPlanarProtectionEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfPowerStoneItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength and the ability to cast bull strength spell 3 times per day as a 3rd level wizard.

enchant.name: Strength4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Strength (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: RingOfProtection1
description: This ring grants its wearer a +1 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection1
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

enchant.name: Deflection1
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfProtection2
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfProtection3
description: This ring grants its wearer a +3 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection3
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfProtection4
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfProtection5
description: This ring grants its wearer a +5 deflection bonus to AC. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Deflection5
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfPyromaniatItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring deals fire damage through a spell, they deals additional 1d6 + 1 per 2 caster levels fire damage. They also get a +2 bonus to caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.

name: RingOfRenownArtisanItem
description: This ring grants the wearer +12 competence bonus to Knowledge

name: RingOfSacredTouchItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring lands any touch attack against the enemy, this attack deals additional 1d6 holy damage and whenever the wearer heals a target via touch spells, the spell heals for additional 1d6 points.

name: RingOfSecurityItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 deflection bonus to AC, a +2 resistance bonus on all Saving Throws, and spell resistance 14.

enchant.name: Deflection2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfSharpStrikeItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring shoots an enemy engaged in melee combat, and hits, the enemy suffers a -1 penalty on attack rolls for one round.

name: RingOfSourceOfInvisibilityItem
description:
This ring grants its wearer the ability to cast poison spell three times per day as a 7th level cleric.
If the wearer has the Invisible Thief ability, the ring allows them to use it for 5 additional rounds per day.

name: RingOfStichesItem
description: This ring grants its wearer immunity to bleed.

name: RingOfTheDeadItem
description:
This ring allows the owner to use the Dead Inside ability on a living creature for 1 minute 3 times per day. While under the effect, the creature is immune to all mind-affecting effects, death effects, disease, paralysis, poison, sleep effects, and stunning; not subject to nonlethal damage, ability drain, or energy drain, immune to damage to its physical ability scores (Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength), as well as to exhaustion and fatigue effects. However, both positive and negative energy deal damage to it.
This ring also grants the wearer a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against all effects that are mentioned in Dead Inside ability.

name: RingOfTheNaturalBornCommander
display_name: Ring of the Natural Born Commander
description: This ring grants its wearer a +3 insight bonus on all Persuasion skill checks.

enchant.name: RingOfTheNaturalBornCommanderEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 3 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Insight)

name: RingOfTheSneakyWizard
description: This ring grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on all Use Magic Device skill checks and a +2 bonus to Illusion school spells' DC.

enchant.name: RingOfTheSneakyWizardEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Competence)

name: RingOfTwinArrows
description: This ring grants its wearer the ability to cast magic missile spell three times per day as a 3rd level wizard.

name: RingOfUltimateProtectionGreaterItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +5 resistance bonus to all saving throws, a +5 deflection bonus to AC, spell resistance 24, and DR 2/-.

enchant.name: RingOfUltimateProtectionGreaterEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfUltimateProtectionLesserItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +4 resistance bonus to all saving throws, a +4 deflection bonus to AC, spell resistance 19, and DR 1/-.

enchant.name: RingOfUltimateProtectionLesserEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: RingOfUndercoverWizardItem
description: Whenever the wearer of this ring hits 2 or more enemies with a single spell, it grants the wearer total concealment against ranged attacks for 2 rounds. Whenever the wearer kills two or more enemies with a single spell, it grants the wearer total concealment against ranged attacks for the rest of the battle.

name: RingofAdditionalRage
description: If this ring's wearer is a barbarian, it gives them the ability to use Rage for 4 additional rounds per day.

name: RingofConstitution
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 luck bonus to Constitution, and the ability to cast enlarge person spell twice per day as a 1st level wizard.

enchant.name: RingofConstitutionEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Constitution (descriptor: Luck)

name: RingofForceShield
description: This ring generates a shield-sized wall of force that can be wielded by the wearer as if it were a heavy shield (+2 AC) and grants additional DR 2/-.

enchant.name: RingofForceShieldEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Shield)

name: RingofMagicDevices
description: This ring grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus to Use of Magical Devices skill checks and the ability to cast dispel magic spell twice per day as a 7th level wizard.

enchant.name: RingofMagicDevicesEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Competence)

name: RingofSickeningEntanglement
description: This ring grants its wearer the ability to cast sickening entanglement spell three times per day as a 3rd level druid.

name: SacredCommandmentItem
description: If the wearer of this ring has the ability to cast spells spontaneously, it grants them the ability to cast the following spells

name: SealedRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer Cold Resistance 30 and the ability to cast horrid wilting spell once per day as a 17th level wizard.

name: SeelahWeddingShinyRingItem
description: This expensive ring serves little purpose in combat, but is ideal for social events. The wearer can cover themself in glitter for 10 minutes.

name: ShootDownItem
description: The wearer of this ring gets a +1 bonus to attack while using Point Blank Shot.

name: SigilOfCreationRingItem
description:
Whenever the wearer of this ring uses their kinetic healer wild talent, it also applies the effect of the restoration spell to the target. The talent is always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
Empower Spell

name: SigilOfDestructionRingItem
description: This ring doubles the threat range of the wearer's kinetic blasts. This effect stacks with the effect of Improved Critical feat.

name: ThieflingRingItem
description: This ring grants its wearer a +2 competence bonus on Trickery and Stealth skill checks. If the wearer is a Tiefling, the bonus increases to +3.

name: TristianRing
description: This ring of protection +4 grants its wearer a continuous effect of death ward spell.

enchant.name: Deflection4
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to AC (descriptor: Deflection)

name: UnholyShepherdItem
description: While wielding this ring with a sign of Baphomet, you can summon 2 CR 14 Half-Fiendish Minotaurs 3 times per day and they will fight on your side for 10 minutes. However, if you die while wearing this ring, they are summoned too, but now as enemies.

name: UnmakerRingItem
description: Each round the first attack this ring's wearer makes using an unarmed strike or natural weapon, casts the greater dispel magic spell.
